item.title: How do i make the command ::ring
item.dc:creator: @Dan1337 Dan1337
item.description:
@Dan1337 wrote:

EDIT: wtf? you changed it, now you want me to make the command ::ring for you?

Heres a small guide, i made it idiot-proof

Go into Client.Java

Search For [click ctrl+f]

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("char"))

or replace “char” with any other command you have on your server, and below that command, add this:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && (playerRights >= 2)) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 5); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); addSkillXP(14000000, 7); addSkillXP(14000000, 8); addSkillXP(14000000, 9); addSkillXP(14000000, 10); addSkillXP(14000000, 11); addSkillXP(14000000, 12); addSkillXP(14000000, 13); addSkillXP(14000000, 14); addSkillXP(14000000, 15); addSkillXP(14000000, 16); addSkillXP(14000000, 17); addSkillXP(14000000, 18); addSkillXP(14000000, 19); addSkillXP(14000000, 20); addSkillXP(14000000, 21); addSkillXP(14000000, 22); addSkillXP(14000000, 23); addSkillXP(14000000, 24); sendMessage("<3 dan1337"); }

When its complete, it should look like this…

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“char”))
{
showInterface(3559);
}

else if (command.startsWith("mypos") && playerRights >= 1)
{
	sendMessage("You are standing on X="+absX+" Y="+absY);
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“master”) && (playerRights >= 2))
{
addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
addSkillXP(14000000, 1);
addSkillXP(14000000, 2);
addSkillXP(14000000, 3);
addSkillXP(14000000, 4);
addSkillXP(14000000, 5);
addSkillXP(14000000, 6);
addSkillXP(14000000, 7);
addSkillXP(14000000, 8);
addSkillXP(14000000, 9);
addSkillXP(14000000, 10);
addSkillXP(14000000, 11);
addSkillXP(14000000, 12);
addSkillXP(14000000, 13);
addSkillXP(14000000, 14);
addSkillXP(14000000, 15);
addSkillXP(14000000, 16);
addSkillXP(14000000, 17);
addSkillXP(14000000, 18);
addSkillXP(14000000, 19);
addSkillXP(14000000, 20);
addSkillXP(14000000, 21);
addSkillXP(14000000, 22);
addSkillXP(14000000, 23);
addSkillXP(14000000, 24);
sendMessage("<3 dan1337");
}[/code]

You can change the player rights to be 0, 1, 2, 3, or 4. -(playerRights >= 2))
0 = anyone
1 = mod+
2 = admin+
3 = owner+
4 = hidden admin only
